legacySection.title: A LEGACY WRITTEN IN CONCRETE update
paragraphs: Well assets (Pvt.) Ltd., established in 1988, is one of the pioneers in the Real Estate and Housing Industry of Bangladesh and one of the founding members of the Real Estate & Housing Association of Bangladesh (REHAB). During its 37 years journey, Well assets has constructed over 4110 apartments (Residential & Commercial) all around Dhaka city and has become a household name for real estate.

All Well assets buildings are designed according to the guidelines stated in the Bangladesh National Building Code (BNBC). As such, Well assets was the first developer to be awarded the ISO 9001:2015 certificate, in recognition of our quality construction and management practices in the real estate development sector.

At Well assets, we believe that our most important achievement to date has been earning the trust and confidence of our clients and patrons. We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for giving us the opportunity to build the home of your dreams.

items.label: Sq ft of real estate developed update

missionSection.title: OUR MISSION
missionSection.description: Our mission is to facilitate our clients with an unparalleled living experience by redefining luxury with seamless convenience.

visionSection.title: OUR VISION
visionSection.description: Well assets aims for customer satisfaction, sustained quality, leadership in real estate, and continual improvement.

csrImages.name: Well assets Extends Support to Triathlete Imtiaz Ilahi for Norseman Xtreme Triathlon
Well assets Group becomes a Platinum Sponsor of the Dhaka Half Marathon 2020
Well assets Group conducted a voluntary blood donation initiative on March 07, 2020 at Well assets Lounge

excellenceItems.title: On-Time Handover
excellenceItems.description: At Well Asset, our unwavering client commitment is at the heart of our business. We consistently deliver projects on time, regardless of market conditions, showcasing our dedication to meeting client expectations.

excellenceItems.title: Client Satisfaction
excellenceItems.description: Well Asset upholds the principle: Once a client, always a client. Even after handover, we are here to provide any service, whether it's assisting with interior design, maintenance, or simply being a listening ear for your feedback. We have many experiences helping clients and landowners with requests, even 27 years after project handover.

excellenceItems.title: Ethical Engineering
excellenceItems.description: We maintain distinct safety and quality teams, overseeing every construction facet to ensure precise adherence to the design. Our commitment extends to upholding material quality, workmanship standards, and worker safety.

excellenceItems.title: Quality Construction
excellenceItems.description: Since 1988, Well Asset has designed and built over 168 projects, adhering to the Rajdhani Unnayan Kartripakkha (RAJUK), Bangladesh National Building Code (BNBC), and all relevant codes. Our building meets earthquake and fire safety standards, incorporates green spaces and community amenities, and ensures disability access.

excellenceItems.title: Symbol of Excellence
excellenceItems.description: Since 1988, Well Asset (Pvt.) Ltd. has been dedicated to delivering quality homes to Dhaka's residents. Despite Dhaka's smaller scale then, our management foresaw its potential and worked tirelessly to create ideal homes. With 36 years of experience, Well Asset has constructed over 3870 apartments across Dhaka, earning the trust and confidence of clients like you, allowing us to fulfill their dream homes.

recognitionItems.title: Symbol of Excellence
recognitionItems.description: We strive for excellence in everything we do, setting industry standards.
